data.approach: Research and present architecture options for Slack webhook integration with SQUAD IDE server

data.question: Which Slack integration approach do you want to implement?

data.approach: Implementing squad-ingest content ingestion system with Slack, Telegram, and RSS adapters

summary: Built squad-ingest polling daemon with Slack, Telegram, and RSS adapters
Created SQLite dedup database with ingested_items, adapter_state, and poll_log tables
Built config system loading ~/.config/squad/feeds.json with secret resolution via squad-secret
Implemented image/file downloader with retry logic
Created CLI tools: squad-ingest, squad-ingest-test, squad-ingest-status, squad-ingest-server
Updated symlink-tools.sh and install.sh for installation
Verified RSS adapter works with live Hacker News feed
Built squad-ingest polling daemon with Slack, Telegram, and RSS adapters
Created /ingest IDE route with template cards for RSS, Slack, Telegram, Custom
Built IngestWizard drawer with multi-step setup flow per source type
Created /api/config/feeds endpoint for CRUD on feeds.json
Added Ingest to sidebar navigation in navConfig and Sidebar.svelte
Build succeeds with zero new type errors
Created verify endpoint for Slack/Telegram token testing
Added inline token auth UI to IngestWizard for both Slack and Telegram
Updated validation to require token exists before proceeding

data.approach: Implemented Slack thread reply tracking across 7 files

summary: Investigated potential approaches for integrating Slack webhook with SQUAD task ingestion
Explored external API exposure strategies including ngrok and dedicated service options
Identified potential integration methods for automatic task creation from Slack messages

quality.preExisting: No existing integration mechanism for Slack content

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Webhook Receiver for Slack Message Ingestion
suggestedTasks.description:
Create a dedicated service or API endpoint that can receive Slack webhook events and convert them into SQUAD tasks. This service should:
- Parse incoming Slack message payloads
- Extract relevant content and metadata
- Automatically create tasks in SQUAD system
- Handle authentication and security for webhook
- Provide logging and error handling for ingestion process
suggestedTasks.reason: Direct solution to manual content transfer workflow discovered during investigation

suggestedTasks.title: Design Secure Webhook Authentication Mechanism
suggestedTasks.description:
Develop a robust authentication strategy for the Slack webhook integration. Consider implementing:
- Slack-provided verification tokens
- HMAC signature validation
- IP range restrictions
- Potential use of OAuth for enterprise-level security
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure secure method for external system task creation

documentationNeeds: Update integration guide for Slack webhook process
